name: ConnecTurn
description:
In this puzzle game you control an armature rotating around a point in 2D. When the armature you control touches another, they join together and the previously unconnected armature's point of rotation becomes their collective point of rotation.

You complete a level by moving the star marked object (not the whole, only the star marked part) to the target area (a green flag in a circle)

  • H - Show/Hide help overlay
  • D, Right Arrow - Rotate clockwise
  • A, Left Arrow - Rotate counterclockwise
